simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Implements the Noop command that demonstrates the HMC5883 task is alive

simplesect.title: Command Verification
simplesect.para:
Successful execution of this command may be verified with the following telemetry:
$sc_$cpu_HMC5883_CMDACTPCNT - command counter will increment
The #HMC5883_CMD_INF_EID informational event message will be generated when the command is received

simplesect.title: Error Conditions
simplesect.para:
This command may fail for the following reason(s):
Command packet length not as expected

simplesect.title: Evidence of failure may be found in the following telemetry:
Command Verification
simplesect.para:
Successful execution of this command may be verified with the following telemetry:
- command counter will be cleared
$sc_$cpu_HMC5883_CMDRJCTCNT - command error counter will be cleared
The #HMC5883_CMD_INF_EID debug event message will be generated when the command is executed

simplesect.title: Error Conditions
simplesect.para:
This command may fail for the following reason(s):
Command packet length not as expected

simplesect.title: Evidence of failure may be found in the following telemetry:

simplesect.para:
Successful execution of this command may be verified with the following telemetry:
- command counter will be incremented
The HMC5883_CALIBRATE_INF_EID debug event message will be generated when the command is executed
